reference.shortdesc: The tablelist element either references a topic containing a list of tables in the book, or indicates to a processor that a list of tables can be generated at this location in the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: When the href attribute is not specified, a processor might generate a list of tables at the specified location in the map.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The tablelist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
